title: Planetary Defense, Healthy Food, Slime, Software Citation, Parthenon Marbles
description: The Era of Planetary Defense Has BegunIn their textbook Modern Principles of Economics, Tyler and Tabarrok use asteroid defense as an example of a public good.Food fight: FDA is redefining ‘healthy’ and food...
contentHtml:
The Era of Planetary Defense Has Begun

In their textbook Modern Principles of Economics, Tyler and Tabarrok use asteroid defense as an example of a public good.

Food fight: FDA is redefining ‘healthy’ and food industry is pushing back

Less saturated fat, less sodium, less added sugar; manufacturers say almost no packaged foods would qualify under the agency’s new rules.

From Ghostbusters to H.P. Lovecraft: A Cultural History of Slime

A short cultural history of slime.

Advancing Software Citation Implementation (Software Citation Workshop 2022)

This report outlines a series of collaborative discussions that brought together an international group of stakeholders and experts.

The strange journey of the Parthenon Marbles to the British Museum

Short video telling the story of how the Parthenon Marbles were moved from Athens to London 200 years ago.

References

Tabarrok, A. (2023, March 8). The Era of Planetary Defense Has Begun. Marginal REVOLUTION. https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2023/03/the-era-of-planetary-defense-has-begun.html

Reiley, L. (2023, March 6). Food fight: FDA is redefining ‘healthy’ and food industry is pushing back. Washington Post. https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2023/03/05/fda-healthy-food-sugar/

From Ghostbusters to H.P. Lovecraft: A Cultural History of Slime ‹ Literary Hub. (n.d.). Retrieved March 28, 2023, from https://lithub.com/from-ghostbusters-to-h-p-lovecraft-a-cultural-history-of-slime/

Bouquin, D., Trisovic, A., Bertuch, O., & Colón-Marrero, E. (2023). Advancing Software Citation Implementation (Software Citation Workshop 2022) (arXiv:2302.07500). arXiv. https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.2302.07500
